title: Evo Magazine Font
content:
Hi trying to find out what this font is...i find it really hard when they are all capitals.

thank you for any help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022203737im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_4097.jpg)
author: RadioB

comments.content: sorry forgot to add im asking about the large bold text "CAYMAN BITES BACK"

Very close to [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022203737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova) but can't be positive. /S and /M look a bit off. Would need more distinctive letters. That's may be something from Font Bureau...

EDIT: could be [Salvo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022203737/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/salvo-sans), a bit more extended than Proxima Nova and /M and /S look better.
Benton Sans Black (Font Bureau) is close. Got it withFind My Font.
thank you!..Salvo sans black is a perfect fit....thanks for your help
